Name: Sir Bors
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with a War Axe.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Models in this Formation may-re-roll failed wound rolls of 1 when attacking enemy LEGENDARY Formations in the Melee Combat Step.
When this model completes a charge, improve the Damage Characteristic of this model’s War Axe by 1 until the end of the Round.
